1.0.name: wordpress/wp-galleria
1.0.description:
A plugin which generates photo galleries on the fly. All the user should do is just upload his folders with photos to the server in your uploads wp-galleria/ folder.

The plugin automatically parses the directories inside and generates the pages and thumbnails.

WP-Galleria uses FancyBox to render photos.

Checkout the live demo.
